titleStmt.title: Two letters from Major General Overton, (directed to a friend) The one from Aberdeen, dated the 26. Decemb. 1654. The other from the Tower of London (the place of his confinement) dated Janu. 17. 1654. Tending to his vindication from many unjust aspersions cast upon him by the pamphleteers, and others; and for more generall and requisite information.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Robert, ca. 1609-ca. 1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Livewell Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
